desc: Global XR Academy is an online program that currently offers immersive learning experiences in virtual reality. Browse our courses or learn how to partner with us.

layout.text:
Global XR Academy is the new XR marketplace for immersive XR learning experiences. It brings together educators who want to teach a course, institutions that want to offer their courses and learners who want to expand their knowledge.
Our goal is to decentralize learning and build 21st century skills for learners to compete in social, academic, and workplace settings.
